name: Lunar Guard
description:
Welcome to Lunar Guard

[ Developed by GROUP 1 | ICT-10 for Research Project ]

∘ The experience of the Lylat System's moon defender is essential to the game's plot. Making sure that nobody threatens the safety of the moon is the game's major goal. The player's job is to defend the moon from the bad aliens and see that peace is established.

If the player reaches the end of the stage, the game advances to the next stage with additional obstacles. If the player loses all of its health, the game will restart to the start of the current stage. The player traverses the stage by jumping on platforms, and at the conclusion of the stage is a door that must be entered to go to the next stage.

∘ Keyboard Controls

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

W - Jump

H - Throw Sword to the Left

J - Throw Sword to the Right

∘ This game is available on all platforms: Mobile and PC

∘ This game is developed for research project purposes and made by Group 1 from Grade 12 and Section of ICT 10 in Arellano University - Andres Bonifacio Campus
